name: Temple Maker
description:
Consider playing the downloadable version!

It has better performance and less known issues (the web version has a bug where you cannot paste text into it).
Link in the download section.

Built-in Level Editor

Temple maker is a puzzle game built around its level editor!

Make your own levels!

In this game, whenever you are killed, you become a boulder that can be used by your next lives to progress through each level.

Also, in the level editor, the amount of credits to build the level that you get is proportional to the number of lives you allow the player to use!

Known Issues

[WEBGL BUILD] Pasting text into the web build of the game seems to not be working. Consider playing the downloadable version. (links in the download section)

[BOTH] Audio has some gaps. Worse in WebGL build.

Made in 48h for Ludum Dare 44

The theme of the jam was Your life is currency.

I have approached the theme by incorporating the death of your character as requirement for solving puzzles and by making the level editing currency tied to the maximum lives in the level.
